---
title: Harper's Ferry
author: Apurva Nakade
date: 2023-09-02
---

Last couple of years I lived in Chicago and could not go on hikes. 
The land there is flatter than a pancake. 
It is a perfect place for long-distance biking but an extremely boring one for hiking.

I hiked the Loudon Height's trail at Harper's Ferry and absolutely loved it.
It was a bit tedious at first with no change in scenery - but that is the whole point of hiking.
It is not about change, or getting somewhere but the journey itself. 
You walk for hours and let your mind settle down and take in the beauty of your surroundings.
